member.name: M:UXAV.AVnet.Crestron.Nvx.NvxControl.RouteStream(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Routes stream from one encoder to another. Automatically sets source as stream on receiver. This is not supported by "DmNvxD30" and "DmNvxD30C" devices.
member.exception: IP ID does not exist in system

member.name: M:UXAV.AVnet.Crestron.Nvx.NvxControl.SetSource(System.UInt32,Crestron.SimplSharpPro.DM.Streaming.eSfpVideoSourceTypes)
member.summary: Select source input on encoder or decoder types This method is not supported by DMF-XX-4K-SFP,"DmNvxD30","DmNvxD30C","DmNvxE30","DmNvxE30C","DmNvxE31" and "DmNvxE31C" devices.
member.exception: IP ID does not exist in system

member.name: M:UXAV.AVnet.Crestron.Nvx.NvxControl.SelectSubscribedStream(System.UInt32,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Selects the video source from choice of subscribed streams
member.exception: IP ID does not exist in system
